Description: BRAND/MAKE: MARVIN WAFFEN ELITE M-B MILITARY WW2 STYLE VINTAGE SWISS POCKET WATCH MOVEMENT. MODEL NAME: WRISTWATCH. CASE MADE OF/AND SIZE: NEW CUSTOM MADE case. Size: Diameter 47.5 mm (1.90 in) (not counting the crown). Lug to lug is 56 mm (2.24 in). Thickness 15 mm (0.60 in). CASE BACK: Case with exhibition back lid with minerale glass. DIAL COLOR: Silver ton metal dial. The NEW metal dial is specifically made for this movement.MECHANISM: LONGINES Swiss made pocket watch movement, 16 jewels, 4 adjust, breguet mainspring. Working very good, very clean. This antique wristwatch has the original movement in an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Mechanism has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time. Antique watches generally experience an error of up to 5 minutes a day. Any accuracy of +,- 5 minutes is very good. 3-x signed MARVIN on movement and dial. CLASS/CRYSTAL: DOME MINERALE GLASS. CROWN/PUSH BUTTONS: SILVER ton setting crown. BRACELET/STRAP: 22 mm (0,88 in) - as a gift for you. FUNCTIONS: TIME. Second hand at 9. ABOUT WATCH: Working, rare, vintage and collectible. These unique watch were kept till our time in very good condition.Getting such thing you do good capital investment.
